articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Ukraine can strike inside Russia with British weapons, UK's Cameron says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: UK’s top diplomat also pledges £3 billion of annual military help to Ukraine for ‘as long as it takes.’
articles.content: Since the beginning of the war, Ukraines Western partners have set one condition for Kyiv to keep military aid coming dont strike in Russia. But countries including Finland and Latvia have since said… [+792 chars]
